greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 1 if n is representable as sum of two nonnegative squares, otherwise 0.
comment: Multiplicative because A002654 is. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 01 2018
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(f=0); my(r=sqrtint(n)); forstep(i=r, 1, -1, if(issquare(n-i*i), f=1; break)); f
xref: Cf. A002654, A004018, A070176. Partial sums are in A102548.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Sep 17 2013
